We will first need you to allow Testbed 360 to read and write files, in order to display pictures and track the user\'s movements:
Training is now finished. By clicking on Start, you will begin evaluating pictures that will be displayed to you in the same way you saw in training. You may now proceed!
You have now finished the session. Please give the headset back to the supervisor. Thanks for your time!

"Welcome to Testbed360! To click on a button, focus it and press a button on your headset. You can scroll through this text using the ▲ and ▼ buttons. The experiment will start with a training session, where you will see 3 already graded pictures. When you have seen a picture for enough time, focus anywhere and press a headset button to make the menu appear. Then just click on the selected grade to go to the next picture. When the training part is done, a menu will warn you that you will start the evaluation part, where you will grade pictures yourself. You may now start!"
